cast.overview: Set in the Mayan civilization, when a man's idyllic presence is brutally disrupted by a violent invading force, he is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression where a harrowing end awaits him. Through a twist of fate and spurred by the power of his love for his woman and his family he will make a desperate break to return home and to ultimately save his way of life.
cast.title: Apocalypto

cast.overview: In Mexico, two teenage boys and an attractive older woman embark on a road trip and learn a thing or two about life, friendship, sex, and each other.
cast.title: Y Tu Mamá También

details.biography: Mexican theater, film and TV actress, she is a graduate of one of the best acting schools in Mexico. Her performances have been screened nationally and internationally and she has been nominated for the Ariel Award in four editions, a Silver Goddess and other important recognitions.
details.name: Mayra Sérbulo
